subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Amar’e Stoudemire had 32 points in his Knicks debut and Danilo Gallinari added 24 in a 125-113 victory over Armani Jeans Milano, Gallinari’s former team.
snippet: Amar’e Stoudemire had 32 points in his Knicks debut and Danilo Gallinari added 24 in a 125-113 victory over Armani Jeans Milano, Gallinari’s former team.
